FS.title: Eng. Sergio Mercado
FS.content: I am Sergio Mercado, System Engineer with B2 english level, i work as web developer focused on good practices and agile methodologies to provide quality results.

AM.title: About me
AM.content_One: Here, Sergio Fernando Mercado Galarza, I am 26 years old and I am from Bolivia, i studied Systems Engineer at University Domingo Savio and also english at Centro Boliviano Americano (CBA).
AM.content_Two: Over the years I had worked with different tecnologies, most on personal monetized projects, also I worked doing SEO for blogs and Youtube channels.
AM.content_Three: One of my biggest goals is to be able to dedicate myself full time to my freatest passion, the 'Web Development'.
